content.text: Great quality and exactly what I wanted.

Royal Signs & Awnings did an amazing job on my pole sign! The process was smooth, the team was friendly and professional, and the final product looks fantastic. Great quality and exactly what I wanted. I’ve already gotten a lot of compliments. Highly recommend!
We had a very strict landlord and a limited budget! But they did great job with our sign! We highly recommend this company.
The sign looks amazing at night!

The experience at Royal Signs was very professional from the entire team. They immediately responded to my email on the same day and we had pricing within a few short days later. Their team took pictures of our actual building and made sure the sign was sized properly and looked good on the building as part of their estimate details. We were very happy with the finished product and will be taking their design and company contacts to our other franchise owners with Mr. Electric. The sign looks amazing at night!
We hope to do business with them again!

They are AMAZING to work with, very professional and communication and finished product was what we expected. We had a minor issue on our end which they worked it out with us. We hope to do business with them again!

I came to them with an idea and a drawing of what I wanted and they brought my vision to life. They were very professional and did a fantastic job. I strongly recommend them. From Design to Permit to installation, made it a painless process.
Our lobby illuminated sign was installed today, and it looks beautiful!

Our lobby illuminated sign was installed today, and it looks beautiful! The care taken by the installers to plan the install before starting the work, and their focus on the details to ensure the lighted letters would be hung correctly without damaging the panel wall was exactly what we were looking for…and received! Thank you to all parties involved on this project that focused on the details to create a beautiful sign for our company.
Didn't fail to provide the best service.

Good company We opened a new branch and used same Royal Signs only and fortunately they were situated near my new branch also so I hired them only and again they didn't fail to provide the best service
Team was amazing to work with!

Royal Signs and Awnings have been exceptional in every aspect from start to finish on our project. The Austin, Texas team was amazing to work with namely Lawrence, I mean what a solid dude. Very through, listened to all our ideas and brought it to life always keeping us up to date with the entire process. Jose which is our installer for this project did such an amazing job and really was a pleasant individual altogether. Completely satisfied with going with this company and definitely recommend and will be using again.
On time on budget and the signs look great.
We are very happy with the services provided by Royal Signs & Awnings, on time on budget and the signs look great. Thank you!
Marukh did a great job with helping us decide on our building sign for the company!
The turn around time is fast.
Once the order is placed, the turn around time is fast. Marukh was on top of communication with our team every step of the way.
I am extremely satisfied with my experience!

I recently had the pleasure of working with Royal Signs for the creation of a sign, and I must say that the entire experience exceeded my expectations. From the initial inquiry to the final delivery, every step of the process was seamless and enjoyable. The customer service provided by the team at was exceptional. They were responsive, attentive, and went above and beyond to address my questions and concerns. It's evident that they prioritize customer satisfaction, and that commitment truly sets them apart. When it came to the design phase, I was impressed by their creativity and willingness to collaborate. They took the time to understand my vision and offered valuable insights to enhance the overall aesthetics of the sign. The attention to detail was remarkable, resulting in a final product that perfectly captured the essence of what I had envisioned. Quality is paramount when it comes to signage, and Royal signs certainly delivered. The materials used were of the highest caliber, ensuring durability and a professional appearance. The craftsmanship was evident, and I have received numerous compliments on the sign's clarity and vibrant colors. What sets apart is not just the product they deliver but the overall experience they provide. The efficiency of the production process, coupled with timely updates on the status of my order, gave me confidence in their reliability. They managed to strike the right balance between speed and precision. In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend Royal Signs to anyone in need of signage solutions. Their dedication to customer satisfaction, creative design approach, and commitment to quality make them a standout choice in the industry. I am extremely satisfied with my experience and the final product, and I will undoubtedly return to them for any future signage needs.
They are very focused on delivering superior results.

Royals Signs & Awnings is a 1 of a kind type of company. They are very focused on delivering superior results and always ensure to carefully understand the clients requirements and will revise as many times as needed until they satisfy the desired vision. Throughout our multiple projects with them, they have exercised tremendous communication, flexibility, creativity and patience. This is our second location and they have effectively executed on their promise in delivering the signs on time. We all look forward to commencing our operations with these beautiful and well-made/designed/attractive signs that are sure to capture the much needed attention of the public. 1000 kudos to this wonderful team!
Very helpful and the process was simple!
Marukh was very helpful and the process was simple to have our building sign refreshed. I recommend giving them a chance for any project you may have.
Professional service and highly recommended Good quality and better than others
They have certainly earned our trust and future business.

I recently had the pleasure of working with Royal Signs and Awnings and I am impressed and satisfied with their service and products. I'm also pleased with the quality of the products, installation and the pricing. I highly recommend them for their work. They have certainly earned our trust and future business.

Absolutely thrilled with the quality and creativity of the signs produced by this company! Exceptional attention to detail, timely delivery, and fantastic customer service. Highly recommend for anyone in need of top-notch signage.
Fantastic and delivers as they say!

The company is now under new management and runs fantastic and delivers as they say! so try them now and those who had a bad time with Hamid - can get a very high quality service from them. call them!
Impressive work done by Royal Signs...

Royal Signs LLC, N Briery Rd, Irving, TX 75061, United States Impressive work done by Royal Signs... I found Royal Signs & Awnings a wholesale sign company after a thorough research, with affordable rates... they did a two store front channel letter signs and monument sign.
Awesome service and quality, I highly recommend royal signs for business.
I have worked with them for a long time!
I have worked with them for a long time! Such amazing quality and customer service! Thank you- you always have my business and referrals!
They were prompt and very knowledgeable for my needs. I would highly recommend their services.
Royal Signs provided a quote for signage I requested. They were prompt and very knowledgeable for my needs. I would highly recommend their services.

Royal Signs & Awnings is an amazing company! We truly enjoyed working with them as this is a team of professionals who are dedicated to getting the job done correctly. They followed up with us daily and provided exactly what we wanted for our business. Do not hesitate or look any further for your signage needs!
Will always recommend them to anyone.
Love my sign from Royal Signs & Awnings! Great quality, exceptional service and all of the work was done in a timely manner. Will always recommend them to anyone looking for quality signs.
I had a wonderful experience with this company!

I had a wonderful experience with this company! Royal Signs & Awnings was wonderful! I had no idea on what I was doing and they made each step simple! Very inexpensive price for high quality work!!! I would definitely use again!!!

We wanted to have an Awning in front of our coffee shop. We had a concept and a little design but Royal Signs & Awnings made it more perfect and once the installation was finished we were happy with the result. Highly recommended!

I really enjoy working with Royal Signs & Awnings. Their competitive pricing and quality craftsmanship is trendsetting. I was impressed with their industry knowledge and their state of the art manufacturing. I will be using them exclusively from now on. I highly recommended.
Great place to get signs. Very quick turnaround and good product. Helpful staff.
Completed on time and the quality was great.

The folks at Royal Sign did a fantastic job on the sign work for our new building. The price was competitive, the work was completed on time and the quality was great. Best of all...no surprises. Thanks Royal Sign!!
We used them for our sign in front of our building and they were great!

We had a positive experience with Royal Signs, from the moment I reached out to them to the actual day of delivery everything was professional and it was a very smooth process. We would recommend to anybody and would definitely work with them in the future.
I cannot say enough good things about this company!

I cannot say enough good things about this company! They patiently worked with me to make sure that my vision for a custom outdoor buisness sign and interior sign was carried out and I couldn't be happier with the results. They were responsive, professional, and create beautiful signs! Would highly recommend.
Highly recommend Royal signs for all your business signage and building banners.

Royal signs & awnings continue to impress us with their workmanship and customer service. We have been using them for over 5 years with three of our businesses and they have delivered quality signs at reasonable pricing. Jeremy is a good project manager and very attentive. Highly recommend Royal signs for all your business signage and building banners.
Hats off to our entire team for yet again delivering another amazing piece of work. Royal Signs & Awnings reigns supreme!
We completed two major projects with Royal Signs. Great overall experience, very knowledgeable staff and good quality product.
Sign looks beautiful. Have received many compliments. Very satisfied.
Special thanks to Heather for helping us deliver our project before deadline!

Royal Signs & Awnings impressed me with their remarkable combination of time efficiency, affordability, and unwavering commitment to top-notch quality. From start to finish, their professionalism ensured prompt delivery without compromising on excellence. Their pricing was transparent and tailored, offering outstanding value. The materials used and craftsmanship showcased their dedication to producing visually stunning, durable signage. With exceptional customer service, Royal Signs & Awnings is the go-to choice for my future signage needs! Special thanks to Heather for helping us deliver our project before deadline!
Great sign installer. Affordable, Dependable and great work. Our company uses their services throughout Texas. Would highly recommend.
We are very satisfied with our sign! Price was very reasonable and great quality. They handled the permits, finished before lead time, very recommended!
Good quality and much affordable service.
Professional service and highly recommended Good quality and much affordable service.
